body: Not NTR, but kinda sad for the bro

To the guy that said this is NTR. The series was never about the guy we were following in this chapter. Each chapter was about a couple being made (except the top 1 Bunny), so in this chapter everyone was quitting so that they'll only sleep with the guy they really like.
Now if only the elf series could finish getting translated

There is no single MC and only one story is somewhat NTR. Other than that, at the worst of times, it’s consensual swinging. This series took 6 years to translate, let’s hope someone actually reuploads better scans to translate again, cause Christ has it been a long time since the previous chapter.
So basically, we follow the mc as he discovers all the girls he want to fuck are being fucked by someone else. Isn’t this literally ntr?
